casebody.data:
NC BOARD OF PHARMACY
v.
COMMISSION. No. 673A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 8, 2006. Carson Carmichael, III, M. Denise Stanford, Anna Baird Choi, Paul K. Sun, Jr., Julia *426F. Youngman, Stephen D. Feldman, Raleigh, for NC Board of Pharmacy. William W. Plyler, Stephen T. Smith, Raleigh, Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor-General, for Rules of Review Commission, et al. C. Amanda Martin, Raleigh, Susan C. Winckler, Vice President, for American Pharmacists, et al. Ann M. Anderson, Research Triangle Park, Stanford D. Baird, Daniel J. Palmieri, Raleigh, for NC Citizens for Business, et al. Amy E. Pickle, for NC Coastal Federation, et al. Robert R. Marcus, Angela L. Little, Greensboro, Dale J. Atkinson, Julia C. Works, Evanston, IL, for NABP. Benjamin E. Thompson, III, for NCRMA.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of August 2006 by Plaintiff for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of August 2006."
